question 1 
```{r}
"scores" <- c(2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,10,46)

mean(scores)


min(scores)
max(scores)

numbers_to_test <- min(scores):max(scores)

sum_deviations <-c() 
  for(i in numbers_to_test) {
  sum_deviations[i] <- sum(scores-i)
}

sum_deviations

plot(abs(sum_deviations))

which(sum_deviations == 0)
```

question 2
```{r}
y <- c(2,4,6,8,10,13,16,19,22,26)

numbers_to_test <- min(y):max(y)

sum_y <- sum(numbers_to_test)

sum_ysquare <-c()
  for(i in numbers_to_test){
    sum((numbers_to_test)^2)
  }

sum_ysquare-((sum_y)^2)/(length(y)-1)


var(y)

             
             
             
             
             
        



```

question 3
```{r}
library(dbplyr)

library(ggplot2)


class <- c('morning','afternoon','nighttime')
class_means <- c(85,90,93)

school_data <- data.frame(class, class_means)

str(school_data)



group_means <- school_data 
             
                
                
             

ggplot(group_means, aes(x = class, y = class_means))+
  geom_bar(stat="identity")


```  






question 4
```{r}
library(dbplyr)

library(ggplot2)


class <- c('morning','afternoon','nighttime')
class1_means <- c(75,78,80)
class2_means <- c(88,76,63)
school_data <- data.frame(class, class1_means, class2_means)

group_means <- school_data 
             
knitr::kable(group_means)                
                
             

ggplot(group_means, aes(x = class, y = class1_means, z = class2_means))+
  geom_bar(stat="identity")


```
